contents_1: Located in historic downtown Honolulu is the former official residence of Hawaii’s monarchy.
description: Built in 1882, the former official residence of Hawaii’s monarchy has a sacred history. Purchase tickets in the Iolani Barracks on the Palace Grounds, or call ahead to make a reservation. Chlidren under 5 are not admitted.
